name: Paracelsus no Maken
storyline: The paranormal investigation team from Laplace no Ma travel to London, England to work a business deal with a mysterious occult book publisher, who tasks them to travel across 1930 Europe to find suspected paranormal activity. The adventure unfolds drastically and becomes a race against time to prevent multiple cults from shaping the world in their own ways.
summary: A horror themed dungeon crawler, and sequel to Laplace no Ma, released in 1994 on the NEC PC-98 by Humming Bird Soft. Travel across Europe to fight various secret societies, vampires, werewolves, and other monsters and uncover a dark conspiracy that could spell the end of the world.
